code: import _toConsumableArray from"C:/Users/Gray/Desktop/\u524D\u7AEF\u5DE5\u7A0B/expense-tracker-app/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";var contextReducer=function contextReducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case'Delete':var delItem=state.filter(function(t){return t.id!==action.payload;});localStorage.setItem('transaction',JSON.stringify(delItem));return delItem;case'Add':var addItem=[action.payload].concat(_toConsumableArray(state));localStorage.setItem('transaction',JSON.stringify(addItem));return addItem;}};export default contextReducer;
